refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Functions for querying AAT Layout features in the font face.
HarfBuzz supports all of the AAT tables used to implement shaping. Other AAT tables and their associated features are not supported.

refsect2.title: hb_aat_layout_feature_type_get_name_id ()
refsect2.para: Fetches the name identifier of the specified feature type in the face's name table.

entry.para: The hb_aat_layout_feature_type_t of the requested feature type

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Name identifier of the requested feature type

refsect2.title: hb_aat_layout_feature_type_get_selector_infos ()
refsect2.programlisting: unsigned int hb_aat_layout_feature_type_get_selector_infos (hb_face_t *face, hb_aat_layout_feature_type_t feature_type, unsigned int start_offset, unsigned int *selector_count, hb_aat_layout_feature_selector_info_t *selectors, unsigned int *default_index);
refsect2.para: Fetches a list of the selectors available for the specified feature in the given face.
If upon return, default_index is set to HB_AAT_LAYOUT_NO_SELECTOR_INDEX, then the feature type is non-exclusive. Otherwise, default_index is the index of the selector that is selected by default.

entry.para: The hb_aat_layout_feature_type_t of the requested feature type
offset of the first feature type to retrieve
Input = the maximum number of selectors to return; Output = the actual number of selectors returned (may be zero).
A buffer pointer. The selectors available for the feature type queries.
The index of the feature's default selector, if any.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Number of all available feature selectors

refsect2.title: hb_aat_layout_get_feature_types ()
refsect2.programlisting: unsigned int hb_aat_layout_get_feature_types (hb_face_t *face, unsigned int start_offset, unsigned int *feature_count, hb_aat_layout_feature_type_t *features);
refsect2.para: Fetches a list of the AAT feature types included in the specified face.

entry.para: offset of the first feature type to retrieve
Input = the maximum number of feature types to return; Output = the actual number of feature types returned (may be zero).

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Number of all available feature types.

refsect2.title: hb_aat_layout_has_positioning ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether the specified face includes any positioning information in the kerx table.
refsect2.note: Note: does not examine the `GPOS` table.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: true if data found, false otherwise

refsect2.title: hb_aat_layout_has_substitution ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether the specified face includes any substitutions in the morx or mort tables.
refsect2.note: Note: does not examine the `GSUB` table.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: true if data found, false otherwise

refsect2.title: hb_aat_layout_has_tracking ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether the specified face includes any tracking information in the trak table.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: true if data found, false otherwise

refsect2.title: HB_AAT_LAYOUT_NO_SELECTOR_INDEX
refsect2.para: Used when getting or setting AAT feature selectors. Indicates that there is no selector index corresponding to the selector of interest.

refsect2.title: enum hb_aat_layout_feature_type_t
refsect2.para: The possible feature types defined for AAT shaping, from Apple Font Feature Registry.

refsect2.title: enum hb_aat_layout_feature_selector_t
refsect2.para: The selectors defined for specifying AAT feature settings.

refsect2.title: hb_aat_layout_feature_selector_info_t
refsect2.para: Structure representing a setting for an hb_aat_layout_feature_type_t.

entry.para: The value to turn the selector on
The value to turn the selector off
